Description.Text: Phildene Blackpool Hotel is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Blackpool. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. All the necessary facilities, including luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, restaurant, coffee shop, bar, are at hand. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), heating, desk, television. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Blackpool has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Phildene Blackpool Hotel.
Phildene Blackpool Hotel is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Blackpool. Bot
